title: Olimp2009
author: Olimp2009
content: I am continuing my search for activists in your country. Now we want to find activists to represent our ecosystem at cryptocurrency conferences in IndiaI'm not sure if I can post the link here, but you can check it out on Twitter @UtopiaP2P.We have a huge ecosystem with a lot of products. We have a browser with lots of features, an anonymous messenger, support for content creators.By the way, did you know that if you create a channel on our platform (it's like creating your own server in Discord), our ecosystem will pay you from $0.3 to $1 for each active member of your community.We are a high tech project and you are given the opportunity to represent us at cryptocurrency conferences.You can message me on Telegram @JoBraver

comments.author: elevates
comments.created_time: September 05, 2023, 12:50:02 PMLast edit: September 05, 2023, 01:01:03 PM by elevates
comments.body: What you wrote sounds very lucrative and interesting. I am interested in opening up a dedicated channel exclusive for the Indian community. I would then like to ask how do you guys pay for the community that is active in your ecosystem. Do you guys pay in Bitcoin or your own native token? I have no issues getting paid in your native token but others will have as they are here for Bitcoin. The reason for me asking you such a question is to understand where exactly your token is trading? I would need others to know that payment is not complicated. Next issue would be if those exchanges have mandatory  KYC policy? It is hard to convice a community in these times to follow an altcoin. If you are paying in Bitcoin then it would not be an issue to get a huge number of community members in your ecosystem. Do reply to my question! If you want members from our community.
